All Known Implementing Classes:

Enclosing interface:
ClassFilePREVIEW
public static sealed interface ClassFile.Option permits ClassFile.StackMapsOptionPREVIEW, ClassFile.DebugElementsOptionPREVIEW, ClassFile.LineNumbersOptionPREVIEW, ClassFile.AttributesProcessingOptionPREVIEW, ClassFile.ConstantPoolSharingOptionPREVIEW, ClassFile.ShortJumpsOptionPREVIEW, ClassFile.DeadCodeOptionPREVIEW, ClassFile.DeadLabelsOptionPREVIEW, ClassFile.ClassHierarchyResolverOptionPREVIEW, ClassFile.AttributeMapperOptionPREVIEW
Option is a preview API of the Java platform.
Programs can only use Option when preview features are enabled.
Preview features may be removed in a future release, or upgraded to permanent features of the Java platform.
An option that affects the parsing and writing of classfiles.
